nodes.text: The Sha-Thes Meadow was an uncorrupted plain located south of the Nightmare Lands proper on the planet Voss. The Voss commandos maintained Shad-Ka Outpost in the meadow, and the Defiled Brook ran through it.
The Sha-Thes Meadow appears as an area on Voss in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
